description:
Streamlined and at home in low-light conditions, the Larkins protect your eyes from driving rain, trail grit and handsy greenery.

  • Treated with a military grade anti-fog material to keep you fog-free. Anti-fog lenses perform at their best when clean. Simply wash the lenses with water and they’ll keep your vision clear. When not in use, anti-fog lenses are happiest stored in a warm, dry environment
  • Scratch-resistant polycarbonate lenses
  • 8-base curvature helps to protect you from light coming in at angles
  • Rubber temple tips and rubber nose pads offer a comfortable fit, that doesn’t shift around
name: MEC Larkin Sunglasses - Unisex
